content.description: Sit start in the middle of the blank face with your right hand HIGH on right-facing crimp and your left hand on a sidepull at chest height. Balance out, and throw up and left to the horizontal crack. From there, deadpoint your way straight up using marginal foot holds to a no gimme topout (avoid the corner system, and stay on the face).Given the blankness of the face, it naturally forces some great movement.
content.protection: At least two pads. A spotter is wise.
content.location: Sit start in the middle of the blank face with your right hand HIGH on a right-facing crimp and your left hand on a sidepull crimp at chest height. See the photos.

content.description: Children of Men Wall is a tall, blank, slightly overhung face.
